EmailTemplate.name: 2016-EMEAI-DU1310-EmailBlast.2016-DEALERS-DU1310-EmailBlast-EMEAI Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Protect Your Customers from a Potential $300,000 Headache!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> PROTECT YOURSELF FROM A POTENTIAL $300,000 HEADACHE!
Dear Customer, As you may be aware, Honeywell’s original DU-1310 cockpit displays (p/n 7028140-901/-905) can no longer be repaired. If your aircraft is equipped with the legacy DU-1310 display we encourage you to sign up for our HAPP DU-1310 Extended Coverage. Once covered should you experience a display failure, Honeywell will cover the replacement costs for a newer display.
The HAPP DU-1310 Extended Coverage can be added to your existing or new HAPP contract. For more information and pricing details please click here <[[#]]>.
To sign up for our HAPP DU-1310 Extended Coverage, please contact your preferred avionics dealer or email us directly at happ-sales@honeywell.com <[[mailto:happ-sales@honeywell.com]]>; alternatively visit aerospace.honeywell.com/HAPP <[[http://aerospace.honeywell.com/HAPP]]> LEARN MORE <[[aerospace.honeywell.com/HAPP]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://honeywell.com/privacy/pages/en.aspx]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us]]>
